name: TopBuild Corp.
description: TopBuild Corp. is a leading provider of insulation and building material services in the United States. Founded in 2015 as a spin-off from Masco Corporation, TopBuild specializes in residential and commercial insulation installation, as well as the distribution of insulation products and related materials. The company operates through various brands, including TruTeam and Service Partners, which provide comprehensive insulation solutions tailored to the needs of contractors, builders, and homeowners. TopBuild's commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has established it as a trusted partner in the building industry. The company focuses on sustainable practices, leveraging energy-efficient insulation products that contribute to building performance and energy savings. In addition to insulation, TopBuild offers a range of complementary services such as air sealing, fireproofing, and acoustical solutions, positioning itself as a one-stop solution for construction needs. With a strong focus on growth, TopBuild is actively expanding its footprint through strategic acquisitions and organic growth initiatives, aiming to increase its market share in the evolving construction landscape.
